text: Claude Bolling (10 April 1930 – 29 December 2020) was a French jazz pianist, composer, arranger, and actor. He was born in Cannes, France. He was known as the composer of the Lucky Luke animated movies Daisy Town (1971) and La Ballade des Dalton (1978). Bolling died on 29 December 2020 in Saint-Cloud, France at the age of 90.Décès de Claude Bolling, jazzman et compositeur de musiques de films ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2020 deaths Category:French pianists Category:20th-century French composers Category:French movie actors Category:People from Cannes
title: Claude Bolling
